alert.note: Alert for Central Laramie County; South Laramie Range Foothills (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Freezing Fog Advisory issued December 14 at 12:54AM MST until December 14 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...FREEZING FOG ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM MST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Visibility one quarter mile or less in freezing fog. Minor ice accumulation possible. * WHERE...South Laramie Range Foothills and Central Laramie County including Cheyenne. * WHEN...Until 11 AM MST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Periods of very low visibility and freezing fog will result in hazardous travel conditions through Thursday morning across southeast Wyoming. Please use extra caution over bridges.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you. Also, be alert for frost on bridge decks causing slippery roads.

area.areaDesc: Central Laramie County; South Laramie Range Foothills
